name: Blike
description:
Play as a lone biker wandering a foreign city in search for a home.

Features:

  • Infinite
  • Obstacles
  • Jumping
  • Unique pixel art city and bike

The aim of the game is to simply get as high a score you can by getting as far as you can. Simple right? Wrong. There are many obstacles and drops in your path that prevent you from reaching this goal.
